SEARCH
Package movie

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
movie.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a movie record with 10 attributes (year, title, duration, genres, rating, score, director, and actors). The class is designed to handle semantic validation of movie attributes and throw appropriate exceptions for invalid data.
Since:
2024-03-27

    • Movie

      public Movie(String[] movieRecordFields) throws SemanticException, MultipleSemanticExceptions
      constructor which validates movie fields before creating Movie object
      Parameters:
      movieRecordFields - - array of 10 candidate fields all in format String
      Throws:
      SemanticException - if only 1 exception occured during movie object construction
      MultipleSemanticExceptions - if more than 1 exception occured - throws an array of exceptions
